SEARCH
Package Controller

Class DoctorController

java.lang.Object
Controller.DoctorController
public class DoctorController extends Object
The DoctorController class handles all actions that a doctor can perform within the system. It includes viewing and updating schedules, managing appointments, and interacting with patient medical records.

    • updateDoctorSchedule

      public void updateDoctorSchedule(String doctorId, LocalDate date, Boolean isAvailable, String time)
      Updates the doctor's schedule by setting availability for a specific date and time.
      Parameters:
      doctorId - the doctor's ID
      date - the date to update the schedule for
      isAvailable - whether the doctor is available at the given time
      time - the time to set availability for

    • createAppointmentOutcome

      public void createAppointmentOutcome(String date, String time, String typeOfService, ArrayList<PrescribedMedication> medications, String notes, String doctorId, String patientId, String appointmentId)
      Creates an appointment outcome and saves it in the system.
      Parameters:
      date - the date of the appointment outcome
      time - the time of the appointment outcome
      typeOfService - the type of service provided during the appointment
      medications - the list of prescribed medications
      notes - consultation notes for the appointment outcome
      doctorId - the doctor's ID
      patientId - the patient's ID
      appointmentId - the appointment's ID
